title: DraftKings Expands Prediction Markets With Crypto.com
description: Jason Robins, DraftKings CEO, discusses major sports leagues’ acceptance of prediction markets and sports betting. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close that the company is excited to be partnering with Crypto.com. (Source: Bloomberg)
